choices.A: The B2C Commerce Order Bundle does not ingest any historical data and only ingests new orders from that point on.
choices.B: The B2C Commerce Order Bundle ingests 30 days of historical data.
choices.D: The B2C Commerce Order Bundle ingests 12 months of historical data.

comments.content:
SORRY B. After you deploy the bundle, allow at least 24 hours for the data to ingest.
When you establish a connection between B2C Commerce and Data Cloud, the B2C Commerce Connector ingests 30 days of historical data. For example, if you establish a connection on May 1, the B2C Commerce Connector ingests historical data from April 2 to May 1. From this point forward, the B2C Commerce Connector continues to ingest data.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The B2C Commerce Order Bundle is designed to capture new orders as they occur. It's primarily focused on providing a real-time stream of order data to Data Cloud.

Selected Answer: B
B it is

Which two areas should the consultant review to help troubleshoot this issue? (Choose two.)

questions.question_text:
A Data Cloud consultant is in the process of setting up data streams for a new service-based data source.

When ingesting Case data, which field is recommended to be associated with the Event Time field?

discussion.content: D is correct here. Event Time field needs an immutable field and Last Modified Data will keep changing.

Selected Answer: A
The Event Time field is a special field type that captures the timestamp of an event in a data stream. It is used to track the chronological order of events and to enable time-based segmentation and activation. When ingesting Case data, the recommended field to be associated with the Event Time field is the Last Modified Date field. This field reflects the most recent update to the case and can be used to measure the case duration, resolution time, and customer satisfaction. The other fields, such as Resolution Date, Escalation Date, or Creation Date, are not as suitable for the Event Time field, as they may not capture the latest status of the case or may not be applicable for all cases. References: Data Stream Field Types, Salesforce Data Cloud Exam Questions

Selected Answer: D
When ingesting Case data into Data Cloud, the field recommended to be associated with the Event Time field is:
D. Creation Date
The Creation Date typically represents the initial point in time when the case was logged, making it a reliable reference for the Event Time field. This ensures that the event timeline accurately reflects when the case was first created.

Selected Answer: D
Event Time is the Primary Key. All the other fields will generate duplicates every time their values have been changed.

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.c360_a_container_basics_attributes.htm&type=5
